alert.note: Alert for Butler; Lawrence (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 5:26PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...HEAVIER SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT CENTRAL LAWRENCE AND CENTRAL BUTLER COUNTIES... At 524 PM EST, heavier snow showers were located 8 miles east of New Castle, moving east at 30 mph. Locations impacted include... New Castle, Butler, Homeacre-Lyndora, Shanor-Northvue, Meridian, Slippery Rock, Meadowood, Oak Hills, Oakwood, New Castle Northwest, New Beaver, and Prospect. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 92 and 107. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 12 and 21. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and deteriorating road conditions. Use caution if you must travel into or through this snow shower. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents.
